definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
treaty of Tianjin of 1885 ceding Vietnam to France

sentences.english: The NT testifies about Jesus Christ who has already come .
In the New Testament, people were baptized as soon as they believed.
sentences.chinese: 在新約聖經中，人信主後便立刻接受洗禮。

sentences.english: In the LaHaye scheme, the New Testament is a sexual guide.
sentences.chinese: 在拉哈伊的方案中，《新約》具有性引導作用。

sentences.english: We don't have a Canon even of the Old Testament, much less of the New Testament yet.
sentences.chinese: 甚至連舊約都還沒有集成正典，那就更別提新約了。

sentences.english: The New Testament assumes membership in a local congregation.
sentences.chinese: 新約聖經中，地方羣體是有會員制的。

sentences.english: The Old Testament is as explicit about the Trinity and the deity of the Messiah as is the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 舊約是關於三位一體和明確的彌賽亞神象新約。

sentences.english: The Epistle to the Galatians is one of the books of the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 該書信向加拉太書是一本書籍的新約聖經。

sentences.english: A modern english version of the bible and apocrypha.
sentences.chinese: 一個聖經的現代英語版本，新約外傳。

sentences.english: They would also say the Bible shows this in the Old and New Testaments.
sentences.chinese: 他們也認爲聖經的舊新約也顯明瞭這一點。

sentences.english: Their speaking was a way of prophesying, the kind of prophesying emphasized in the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 他們的說話乃是新約所強調的那種申言。

sentences.english: Thus dispensationalists have misconstrued God's work of salvation and (again) the newness ofthe New Covenant.
sentences.chinese: 因此，時代論者曲解了神的救贖工作和新約的新義。

sentences.english: Mount Tabor is never mentioned expressly in the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 大博爾山在新約中從未被刻意地提及。

sentences.english: This leads to an insight,though,by this time, when you're surveying your New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 新約讀到這裏，我們可以洞察到一個特點。

sentences.english: What we're going to do is we're going to take the New Testament, and we're going to take the different writings, and we're going to take them apart.
sentences.chinese: 我們將要研究新約，比較不同版本，將它們一一剖析。

sentences.english: Then He will bring His kingdom in, and following that there will be the ultimate consummation of God's New Testament economy.
sentences.chinese: 然後祂要帶進祂的國，接着有神新約經綸的終極完成。

sentences.english: Eros- love between man and woman, sexual desire, never used in NT.
sentences.chinese: 男女間的愛，性的慾望，新約中沒有用過這個字。

definition: Book of Genesis/First Book of Moses
to suffer a calamity/to suffer (e.g. under torture)/distress
